quote: "I'm enough as I am" - The Boy
book: The Boy, The Mole, The Fox, and The Horse
author: Charlie Mackesy

quote: "Imagine how we would be if we were less afraid"
book: The Boy, The Mole, The Fox, and The Horse
author: Charlie Mackesy

quote: "Asking for help isn’t giving up,’ said the horse. ‘It’s refusing to give up." -The Horse
book: The Boy, The Mole, The Fox, and The Horse
author: Charlie Mackesy

quote: "When the big things feel out of control, focus on what you love right under your nose." -
book: The Boy, The Mole, The Fox, and The Horse
author: Charlie Mackesy

quote: "Always remember you matter, you’re important and you are loved, and you bring to this world things no one else can." -
book: The Boy, The Mole, The Fox, and The Horse
author: Charlie Mackesy

quote: "It’s no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then" - Alice
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: "I’m not strange, weird, off, nor crazy, my reality is just different than yours." - The Cheshire Cat
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: "A hug is always the right size." - Winnie The Pooh
author: A.A.Milne

quote: "The things that make me different are the things that make me, me." - Piglet
author: A.A.Milne

quote: "You’re braver than you believe, stronger than you seem and smarter than you think." - Christopher Robin
author: A.A.Milne

quote: "It never hurts to keep looking for sunshine." - Eeyore
author: A.A.Milne
